about_the_game:
Kingdom's Deck is a game about survival and growing your kingdom. As the ruler of the land, you must navigate the challenges of staying alive, taking care of your people's requirements, building a powerful army, and protecting your fort from approaching threats




Step into the role of the king, entrusted with the fate of an entire realm. Your journey is guided by your collection of cards, each with a specific purpose. Some cards help you build crucial structures, like food production, resources, and fortifications. Others strengthen your military forces. Your leadership hinges on using these cards wisely, and choosing the right moments and places to play them.




In this ever-changing kingdom, peace is a rare luxury, as the relentless darkness continually menaces your realm. Prepare your army for defense and construct impenetrable walls to repel the sieges. Your unwavering determination is what will protect your lands.




Unleash the elemental forces at your command with powerful spell cards. From fiery infernos to icy blasts, wield magic to turn the tides of battle in your favor.




Ensure the prosperity and growth of your kingdom by managing vital resources effectively. From food to wood, gold, and stone, maintain a careful balance to sustain your people and fuel your ambitions.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (M2 and M3) or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported

short_description: Kingdom's Deck is a card-based city-builder where you build and protect your Kingdom from the enemy siege. Build your deck, deploy your cards wisely, defend your walls, manage your resources, respond to various events that will shape your city, and create the ultimate Kingdom's deck!
